name: 王建評
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
schedule:
1.     Gas power cycle
2	Gas power cycle
3	Gas power cycle
4	Combined power cycle
5	Combined power cycle
6	Refrigeration Cycles
7	Refrigeration Cycles
8	Refrigeration Cycles
9	期中考
10	Thermodynamic properties relation
11	Thermodynamic properties relation
12	Gas Mixtures
13	Gas Mixtures
14	Gas Mixtures
15	Chemical reaction
16	Chemical reaction
17	Chemical reaction
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
平時 10%
小考 30%
期中 30%
期末 30%
materials: Thermodynamics 8e, Yunus A. Cengel, McGraw Hill, 蔡建雄譯
